verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> shalt thou <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall he let them <S%H7971>go,<s%> and with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall he drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> of his <S%H4480>land.<s%> <S%H776><s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H589>I<s%> am the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And I <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> by the name of <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> but by my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3068>JEHOVAH<s%> was I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to them.

And I have <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6965>established<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them, to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H4033>pilgrimage,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they were <S%H1481>strangers.<s%>

And <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5009>groaning<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> keep in <S%H5647>bondage;<s%> and I have <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and I will bring you <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H5450>burdens<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and I will <S%H5337>rid<s%> you out of their <S%H4480>bondage,<s%> <S%H5656><s%> and I will <S%H1350>redeem<s%> you with a stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and with <S%H1419>great<s%> judgments: <S%H8201><s%>

And I will <S%H3947>take<s%> you to me for a <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will <S%H1961>be<s%> to you a <S%H430>God:<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> which bringeth you <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H5450>burdens<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

And I will bring you <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> concerning the <S%H834>which<s%> I did <S%H5375>swear<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it you for a <S%H4181>heritage:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> but they <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> for <S%H4480>anguish<s%> <S%H7115><s%> of <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and for cruel <S%H4480>bondage.<s%> <S%H5656><s%> <S%H7186><s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Go <S%H935>in,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that he <S%H853>let<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> out of his <S%H4480>land.<s%> <S%H776><s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me; <S%H349>how<s%> then shall <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> me, <S%H589>who<s%> am of <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H8193>lips?<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and gave them a <S%H6680>charge<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> be the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H1004>houses:<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H2585>Hanoch,<s%> and <S%H6396>Pallu,<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> and <S%H3756>Carmi:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> be the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon;<s%> <S%H3223>Jemuel,<s%> and <S%H3226>Jamin,<s%> and <S%H161>Ohad,<s%> and <S%H3199>Jachin,<s%> and <S%H6714>Zohar,<s%> and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a Canaanitish <S%H3669>woman:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> according to their <S%H8435>generations;<s%> <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> and <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari:<s%> and the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> were a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon;<s%> <S%H3845>Libni,<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimi,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath;<s%> <S%H6019>Amram,<s%> and <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> and <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel:<s%> and the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> were a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari;<s%> <S%H4249>Mahali<s%> and <S%H4187>Mushi:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> according to their <S%H8435>generations.<s%>

And <S%H6019>Amram<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H3115>Jochebed<s%> his father's <S%H1733>sister<s%> to <S%H802>wife;<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses:<s%> and the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram<s%> were a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar;<s%> <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> and <S%H5298>Nepheg,<s%> and <S%H2147>Zichri.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel;<s%> <S%H4332>Mishael,<s%> and <S%H469>Elzaphan,<s%> and <S%H5644>Zithri.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H472>Elisheba,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab,<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5177>Naashon,<s%> to <S%H802>wife;<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab,<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah;<s%> <S%H617>Assir,<s%> and <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> and <S%H23>Abiasaph:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7145>Korhites.<s%>

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him one of the <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of <S%H6317>Putiel<s%> to <S%H802>wife;<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H6372>Phinehas:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

These <S%H1931><s%> are that <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Bring <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> their <S%H6635>armies.<s%>

These <S%H1992><s%> are they which <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to bring <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H4480>Egypt:<s%> <S%H4714><s%> these are <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>
And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

That the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> thou <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H1696>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am of <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H8193>lips,<s%> and <S%H349>how<s%> shall <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me?
